name: NEW SUPER RANDOM SALESMAN BROS ULTIMATE MELEE & KNUCKLES
name_original: NEW SUPER RANDOM SALESMAN BROS ULTIMATE MELEE & KNUCKLES
description:
Join with your friends in this multiplayer game, where everyone will compete as a salesman who must fulfill his customer's need and become the salesman of the month.

1.choose an epic name.
2.call your friends or join a room.
3.press play.

4.Listen to the customer's request
5. run and get it 6. take it
7. Fight so they won't steal it.
